mapper.sql: typeId, rootId, parentId, typeName, typeGroup, isValid, createTime, lastUpdateTime, tier
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_typeConfig t WHERE t.parentId = 0 ORDER BY t.typeId

SELECT
FROM tbl_typeConfig t WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY t.typeId

SELECT p.typeName AS parentTypeName, q.typeId, q.rootId, q.parentId, q.typeName, q.typeGroup, q.isValid, q.createTime, q.lastUpdateTime, q.tier FROM tbl_typeConfig q, ( SELECT t.typeName AS typeName, t.typeId AS parID FROM tbl_typeConfig t WHERE t.parentId = 0 ORDER BY t.typeId ) p WHERE q.parentId = p.parID

rootId = #{rootid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
